name: NoNameGame (Acostaudz)
description:
This game is a mix of creativity, memes, music, random stuff and a lot of dopamine because I had little time to finish it.

I called this game NoNameGame for the simple reason that since it has such random things and i didn't know how to name it.

It is quite experimental and I want to consider this game my first game that I made thanks to Daniel Santalla and Wilhem Bates because they are the ones who taught us the video games and programming class.

I hope you enjoy it as much as I did making it, although it is quite short and very random. Ciao!

HOW TO PLAY:

Movement: WASD

Guns (When its needed): 1 pistol, 5 Knife (POWERFULL)

Sprint: Shift

There's some speed buffs around the map, and easter eggs.
